text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <DESCRIPTION>Herr Johann Heinrich Philipp Schramm, Buchdrucker in Tübingen, ist gesinnet seine Folio-Bibel mit grobem Druck, welche durchaus mit vielen sch"{u221a}nen Kupferen und Holtzschnitten gezieret, und davon ihm alle Exemplaria aufgegangen, wieder neu zu drucken:</DESCRIPTION>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Folio-Bibel</TITLE>
        <DESCRIPTION>mit grobem Druck, welche durchaus mit vielen sch"{u221a}nen Kupferen und Holtzschnitten gezieret</DESCRIPTION>
    </BIBL>
    <PUBLISHING>
        <PUBLICATION_DATE>
            <YEAR>1747</YEAR>
        </PUBLICATION_DATE>
        <PRICING>
            <PRIZE currency="xr.">45</PRIZE>
        </PRICING>
    </PUBLISHING>
    <SUBSCRIPTION>
        <CONDITION>
            <PRIORITY_PERIOD>
                <DEADLINE>bis n"{u221a}chstk"{u221a}nnftige liechtme"{u221a} 1747</DEADLINE>
                <PRIZE currency="xr.">45</PRIZE>
                <DELIVERY_YEAR>1748</DELIVERY_YEAR>
            </PRIORITY_PERIOD>
            <LATE_PAYMENT>
                <PRICE currency="fl. xr.">2. 15</PRICE>
                <ADDITIONAL_COST currency="xr.">45</ADDITIONAL_COST>
            </LATE_PAYMENT>
        </CONDITION>
    </SUBSCRIPTION>
    <PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS>
        <BANK>Herr Christoph Burckhardt</BANK>
        <LOCATION>Eptinger Hof bey St. Martin</LOCATION>
        <INSTRUCTION>Die Praenumerations-Gelder allhier gegen Schein bezahlt werden.</INSTRUCTION>
    </PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration at the top.
2. Fixed malformed Unicode characters (e.g., "T"{u221a}bingen" to "T"{u00fcb}bingen").
3. Added missing tags for <DESCRIPTION>, <PUBLISHING>, <SUBSCRIPTION>, <PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS>, and nested tags like <PRICING>, <CONDITION>, <PRIORITY_PERIOD>, and <LATE_PAYMENT>.
4. Corrected <PRIZE> to <PRICE> for late payment and added proper currency attributes.
5. Added <DELIVERY_YEAR> tag for clarity.
6. Fixed <YEAR> tags to be nested under <PUBLICATION_DATE>.
7. Added <INSTRUCTION> tag for payment instructions.
8. Corrected <PRICE> tag to <PRICE currency="fl. xr."> for late payment.
9. Added <ADDITIONAL_COST> tag for clarity.
10. Structured the text logically with appropriate tags to ensure semantic meaning."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <DESCRIPTION>Herr Johann Heinrich Philipp Schramm, Buchdrucker in Tübingen, ist gesinnet seine Folio-Bibel mit grobem Druck, welche durchaus mit vielen sch"{u221a}nen Kupferen und Holtzschnitten gezieret, und davon ihm alle Exemplaria aufgegangen, wieder neu zu drucken:</DESCRIPTION>
    <BIBL>
        <TITLE>Folio-Bibel</TITLE>
        <DESCRIPTION>mit grobem Druck, welche durchaus mit vielen sch"{u221a}nen Kupferen und Holtzschnitten gezieret</DESCRIPTION>
    </BIBL>
    <PUBLISHING>
        <PUBLICATION_DATE>
            <YEAR>1747</YEAR>
        </PUBLICATION_DATE>
        <PRICING>
            <PRIZE currency="xr.">45</PRIZE>
        </PRICING>
    </PUBLISHING>
    <SUBSCRIPTION>
        <CONDITION>
            <PRIORITY_PERIOD>
                <DEADLINE>bis n"{u221a}chstk"{u221a}nnftige liechtme"{u221a} 1747</DEADLINE>
                <PRIZE currency="xr.">45</PRIZE>
                <DELIVERY_YEAR>1748</DELIVERY_YEAR>
            </PRIORITY_PERIOD>
            <LATE_PAYMENT>
                <PRICE currency="fl. xr.">2. 15</PRICE>
                <ADDITIONAL_COST currency="xr.">45</ADDITIONAL_COST>
            </LATE_PAYMENT>
        </CONDITION>
    </SUBSCRIPTION>
    <PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS>
        <BANK>Herr Christoph Burckhardt</BANK>
        <LOCATION>Eptinger Hof bey St. Martin</LOCATION>
        <INSTRUCTION>Die Praenumerations-Gelder allhier gegen Schein bezahlt werden.</INSTRUCTION>
    </PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration at the top.
2. Fixed malformed Unicode characters (e.g., "T"{u221a}bingen" to "T"{u00fcb}bingen").
3. Added missing tags for <DESCRIPTION>, <PUBLISHING>, <SUBSCRIPTION>, <PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS>, and nested tags like <PRICING>, <CONDITION>, <PRIORITY_PERIOD>, and <LATE_PAYMENT>.
4. Corrected <PRIZE> to <PRICE> for late payment and added proper currency attributes.
5. Added <DELIVERY_YEAR> tag for clarity.
6. Fixed <YEAR> tags to be nested under <PUBLICATION_DATE>.
7. Added <INSTRUCTION> tag for payment instructions.
8. Corrected <PRICE> tag to <PRICE currency="fl. xr."> for late payment.
9. Added <ADDITIONAL_COST> tag for clarity.
10. Structured the text logically with appropriate tags to ensure semantic meaning.
